keys.value: Coração Gentil

Uses Trickster benevolence to bolster magical ability.

Increases max MP by 5%.

This skill can only be obtained from a skill book.
Grama Verde

Uses the power of light to nurture and care for all nearby grass.

Can be cast directly in front of the caster. Allies in the area recover MP over time, while enemies receive a Grass Allergy that decreases their move speed.

Does not apply to boss enemies.

While summoned, your move speed increases by 20%.

Summons the trickster's prized Pink Plush Letonsia doll.

Jardim Florido

Sprouts flowers in the surrounding grass.

Can be used while Green Grass is active. Enemies within 10m of the summoned flowers will receive Flower Allergy.
Flower Allergy: Decreases physical and magic attack by 20%.
Jardim de Rosas

Sprouts roses in the surrounding grass and flowers.

Can be used while lower Garden is active. Enemies within 10m of summoned roses will be affected by Thorny Rose.
Thorny Rose: Deals 15% of your damage every 1 second for 10 seconds.
Chuva de Primavera

Showers the nearby grass and flowers with water and brings them new life.

Can be used while Rose Garden is active. Deals an additional 100% of your damage to enemies within 10m and recovers the HP of allies within 10m by 5%.
Festividades Aprimoradas I

Enhances the strength provided to you by the Phantom doll.

Summon time increases by 2 seconds. When the Phantom doll is activated, Ice Breath is used, and you recover MP over time.

Ice Breath: Deal damage with a +3% max MP bonus to enemies within 4m and knock them back.
Allies receive Frost Armor while enemies receive Frost Chain
Frost Armor: Physical defense increases by 20% for 40 seconds
Frost Chain: Move speed decreases by 20% for 30 seconds
After using [Talent] Sneaky Misdirection, a successful breath hit will increase your enemy's cast time by 20% and decrease your cast time by 20% for 30 seconds.
Festividades Aprimoradas II

Enhances the strength provided to you by the Agnas the Cuddly doll.

Summon time increases by 2 seconds. When the Agnas the Cuddly doll is activated, Fire Breath is used, decreasing cast time and cooldown.

Fire Breath: Deal damage with a +5% max MP bonus to enemies within 4m and knock them back. Fire Chain is applied for 30 seconds.
Fire Chain: Deals 30% of damage every 2 seconds for 30 seconds
Após usar [Talent] Desvio Furtivo, um golpe bem-sucedido de Sopro diminuirá a taxa de crítico do seu inimigo em 30% e aumentará a sua taxa de acerto crítico em 15% por 30 segundos.
Festividades Aprimoradas III

Enhances the strength provided to you by the Festival Luna doll.

Summon time increases by 2 seconds. When the Festival Luna doll is activated, Starlight Galaxy is used.

Starlight Galaxy: Deals damage with a +3% max MP bonus to enemies within 4m and knocks them back. Allies receive Starlight Miracle, while enemies receive Starlight Chain.
Starlight Miracle: Max HP increases by 30% for 40 seconds
Light Chain: Dazed for 3 seconds

Após usar [Talent] Desvio Furtivo, um golpe bem-sucedido de Galáxia Estelar diminuirá o ataque e defesa PvP do seu inimigo em 20% e aumentará seu ataque e defesa PvP em 20% por 30 segundos.

Apenas para alvos de PvP.
Festividades Aprimoradas IV

Enhances the strength provided to you by the Pink Plush Letonsia doll.

Summon time increases by 2 seconds. When Pink Plush Letonsia doll is activated, Inspiring Stepping Stones is used.

Inspiring Stepping Stones: Deal damage with a +3% max MP bonus to enemies within 4m and knock them back. Allies receive Morale Boost, while enemies receive Sudden Dismay.
Morale Boost: Semua Attack increases by 20% for 40 seconds
Sudden Dismay: Causes terror for 5 seconds
After using [Talent] Sneaky Misdirection, a successful hit of Inspiring Stepping Stones will increase your enemy's cooldown by 20% and decrease your cooldown by 20% for 30 seconds.
Alegria Contagiosa
Imbues your nearby allies with vitality, increasing MP recovery by 20%.
Nascido para Rir

The trickster's lighthearted spirit improves the doll's power.

Upon using a Doll Summoning skill, Lighthearted increases.
Lighthearted: Cast time decreases by 5%, max HP increases by 3%, and 1% of HP is recovered every 3 seconds (stacks up to 3 times)

Upon using a Flower Garden Summoning skill, Delight increases.
Delight: Max MP increases by 5%, and 0.5% of MP is recovered every 3 seconds (stacks up to 3 times)
Bênção da Deusa

A bênção de Ellora protege da dor da revitalização. Você não receberá penalidades de morte.
Essa bênção irá desaparecer quando você alcançar o nível 8.
Graça de Ellora

A bênção da deusa da luz, Ellora.
Aumenta toda experiência em 20%.
Essa bênção só é efetiva até o nível 40.
Automaticamente ataca o alvo. Pode ser alternado.
Peão Fantoche
Boneca Mortal

Charge 2: Deals 150% bonus damage and an area damage of 3m.
Full Charge: Deals 220% bonus damage and an area damage of 4m near the enemy, pushing the enemy back. A successful critical hit activates a destabilizing attack.

Uses a beautiful gust of cherry blossoms to attack enemies while giving allies a refreshing boost of energy.

Uses a beautiful gust of cherry blossoms to attack enemies while giving allies a refreshing boost of energy.

Deal 100% damage to enemies within 10m, and increase Semua Attack and defense of nearby allies by 30% for 10 seconds.
Increases enemy's cooldown and cast time by 15% for 15 seconds.
When used in the grass region, there is a chance for enemies to enter a Stupefied State for 5 seconds.
